app_description: Intelligent chat client for interacting with local OpenAI-compatible APIs

commands.ask_question: â€¢ Enter any question to chat with AI
commands.quit: â€¢ Enter '/quit' or '/exit' to quit the program
commands.clear: â€¢ Enter '/clear' to clear chat history
commands.help: â€¢ Enter '/help' to view help information
commands.info: â€¢ Enter '/info' to view current API configuration
commands.image: â€¢ Enter '/image' to get the latest image from server and perform multimodal Q&A
commands.load_docs: â€¢ Enter '/load docs' to load and vectorize documents for RAG functionality
commands.multiturn: â€¢ Enter '/multiturn' to enter multi-turn chat mode
commands.single: â€¢ Enter '/single' to exit multi-turn chat mode
commands.lang_help: â€¢ Enter '/lang' to view current language
commands.lang_switch: â€¢ Enter '/lang en' to switch to English, '/lang zh' to switch to Chinese
